headline: Duke Energy leverages AI to protect customers and combat scams
summary: Duke Energy is advancing its commitment to customer safety by deploying artificial intelligence (AI) to detect scams targeting energy customers. This innovative technology scans websites, social media and paid advertisements for open-source social engineering threats, helping to protect customers from fraudulent schemes.

raw.headline: Duke Energy leverages AI to protect customers and combat scams
raw.summary: Duke Energy is advancing its commitment to customer safety by deploying artificial intelligence (AI) to detect scams targeting energy customers. This innovative technology scans websites, social media and paid advertisements for open-source social engineering threats, helping to protect customers from fraudulent schemes.

headline: American Electric's Q4 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y
summary: AEP tops Q4 EPS estimates as revenues jump 13% year over year, with 2026 earnings guidance set at $6.15-$6.45 per share.

raw.headline: American Electric's Q4 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y
raw.summary: AEP tops Q4 EPS estimates as revenues jump 13% year over year, with 2026 earnings guidance set at $6.15-$6.45 per share.

headline: Why stablecoin giant Tether is ‘sweating the least’ amid crypto market rout
summary: Tether executive Bo Hines said the company has been aggressively buying hard assets. That has left it well-positioned to weather crypto’s recent downturn, he added. But one credit rating agency has a different view of Tether’s decision to load up on gold and Bitcoin.

raw.headline: Why stablecoin giant Tether is ‘sweating the least’ amid crypto market rout
raw.summary: Tether executive Bo Hines said the company has been aggressively buying hard assets. That has left it well-positioned to weather crypto’s recent downturn, he added. But one credit rating agency has a different view of Tether’s decision to load up on gold and Bitcoin.

headline: PG&E Q4 Earnings in Line With Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y
summary: PCG Q4 EPS match estimates as 2025 revenues rose Y/Y and operating income improved. It also narrowed 2026 EPS guidance.

raw.headline: PG&E Q4 Earnings in Line With Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y

headline: Entergy's Q4 Earnings In Line With Estimates, Revenues Rise Y/Y
summary: ETR's Q4 EPS matches estimates but falls 22.7% year over year, even as revenues climb 8% and 2026 earnings guidance comes in above consensus.

raw.headline: Entergy's Q4 Earnings In Line With Estimates, Revenues Rise Y/Y
raw.summary: ETR's Q4 EPS matches estimates but falls 22.7% year over year, even as revenues climb 8% and 2026 earnings guidance comes in above consensus.

headline: At $103B, Duke claims largest spending plan of any regulated US utility
summary: The company is already deploying more than $1 billion in capital every month, CEO Harry Sideris said. Its North Carolina utility has a rate case pending.

raw.headline: At $103B, Duke claims largest spending plan of any regulated US utility
raw.summary: The company is already deploying more than $1 billion in capital every month, CEO Harry Sideris said. Its North Carolina utility has a rate case pending.

headline: Does Duke’s Expanded US$103 Billion Grid Investment Plan Reshape The Bull Case For Duke Energy (DUK)?
summary: Duke Energy Corporation has reported its fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 results, with revenue rising to US$7,938 million for the quarter and US$32.24 billion for the year, while full-year net income increased to US$4.97 billion and earnings per share reached US$6.31 from continuing operations. Alongside these earnings, Duke Energy raised its five-year capital plan to US$103 billion and extended its long-term earnings guidance through 2030, underscoring the scale of planned grid and...
